data.title: Exhibitions — TennisCraft
data.text:
Indian Wells

March 12th, 2010

Stadium 1

Inspired by the previous impromptu event in Melbourne, the second Hit for Haiti involved 8 star players, who at the time cumulatively held 94 slams total. The event was able to raise over 1 million dollars.

Steffi Graf & Lindsay Davenport vs Martina Navratilov & Justine Henin

Roger Federer & Pete Sampras vs Rafael Nadal & Andre Agassi

Rally for Relief

January 15th, 2020

Rod Laver Arena in Melbourne, Australia

Amid an Australian summer defined by confronting images of unprecedented bushfire devastation, Tennis superstars united for a special evening at Rod Laver Arena have helped raise close to AUD $5 million for bushfire relief efforts. Roger Federer, Nick Kyrgios, Naomi Osaka, Alexander Zverev, Dominic Thiem, Serena Williams, Caroline Wozniacki, Petra Kvitova, Coco Gauff, Novak Djokovic, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Rafael Nadal all took part in the charity match.

Full Event

Match for Africa

December 21, 2010

Hallenstadion in Zurich, Switzerland.

It was played to benefit the Roger Federer Foundation, which raises money to fund schooling, transport and food for children in Africa. It was the first of two exhibition matches contested by the players in the space of two days, with a match being hosted at the Caja Mágica in Madrid in Nadal's home county, Spain the following day. The match in Madrid was for the benefit of Nadal's foundation, the Fundación Rafa Nadal, and the match was titled "Joining Forces for the Benefit of Children".

Roger Federer vs Rafa Nadal

Roger Federer / Bill Gates vs Rafa Nadal / Trevor Noah

Taipei 2012 Exhibition

May 26th, 2012

Taipei Arena in Taipei, Taiwan

Steffi Graf takes on Martina Hingis while husband Andre Agassi will take on Goran Ivanisevic before the four pair up for a mixed doubles match.

Steffi Graf vs Martina Hingis

Full Match

Highlights

Mixed Doubles: Steffi Graf & Andre Agassi vs Martina Hingis & Goran Ivanisevic

Unfortunately no footage of Agassi vs Ivanisevic apart from small clips.

UNIQLO LIFEWEAR DAY

October 4th, 2019

Ariake Coliseum in Tokyo, Japan

Global Brand Ambassador Roger Federer plays John Isner in a special charity tennis match. It’s my speculation that they originally intended to play Nishikori, but he had to pull out due to injury.

Court Level View

Full Playlist

Highlights

A Night With Roger Federer & Friends

January 8th, 2010

Rod Laver Arena in Melbourne, Australia

Roger Federer ,Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, and Rod Laver team up to raise over $1 million for Federer’s foundation andTennis Australia charities. The Foundation celebrated its 10-year anniversary, which was perfectly capped off by the match between Federer and the French crowd-favorite Tsonga.

Roger Federer vs Jo-Wilfried Tsonga

A NIGHT with ROGER FEDERER & HEWITT

January 12th, 2015

Qantas Credit Union Arena, Sydney

This exhibition aims to promote the global launch of the Fast 4 format: there are no advantage scores, lets are played, tie-breakers apply at three games all, and the first to four games wins the set.

Full Event

Doubles: Mansour Bahrami & Fabrice Santoro vs Henri Leconte & Pat Cash

Singles: Roger Federer vs Lleyton Hewitt

WIMBLEDON 2001 ReMATCH

July 18th, 2019

Stella Maris Court in Umag, Croatia

The two tennis legends, Goran Ivanišević and Patrick Rafter, played a friendly match at the 30th edition of the Plava Laguna Croatia Open Umag as a tribute to the historical Wimbledon final from 2001.

Goran Ivanisevic vs Pat Rafter

FAREWELL To Hamburg

July 23, 2018

Am Rothenbaum court in Hamburg, Germany

Michael Stich will bid farewell as Tournament Director of the German Open in Hamburg with an exhibition match against John McEnroe, with whom he partnered with to win the Wimbledon Doubles Championships in 1992.

Michael Stitch vs John McEnroe
